Rollup plugin project

ROLLUP

< boilerplate />

Build JS plugins with ease!

Getting started

Welcome to the plugin screen! Start editing src/index.js file and save Cmd+S (Ctrl+S on Windows). You can edit this HTML file at dist/index.html. Your changes should reflect here automatically!

For any help or queries please raise your requests here.

You can support this project by contributing to GitHub repo.

Your application root (Edit JS file to see changes here):
